question:
Which of the following parts of the Indian Constitution is described as the 'Magna Carta of India'?
भारतीय संविधान के निम्नलिखित में से किस भाग को 'भारत का मैग्ना कार्य (Magna Carta of India)' कहा जाता है?

Details about Sudarshana lake is given in a rock inscription at Girnar (Junagarh), which was composed to record the achievements of the Shaka ruler_____.
सुदर्शन झील का विवरण गिरनार (जूनागढ़) के एक शिलालेख में उल्लिखित हैं जिसकी रचना शक शासक _______ की उपलब्धियों को दर्ज करने के लिए की गई थी।

Identify whether the following statements are correct or incorrect.
निम्नलिखित कथनों में से कौन-सा कथन सही है।
Statement/कथन 1:
Khasi and Jaintia hills receive the highest rainfall, which exceeds 1000 cm.
खासी और जयंतिया पहाड़ियों में सबसे अधिक वर्षा होती है, जो 1000 सेमी से अधिक होती है।
Statement/कथन 2:
Ladakh and most western Rajasthan receive rainfall above 150 cm.
लद्दाख और अधिकांश पश्चिमी राजस्थान में 150 सेमी से अधिक वर्षा होती है।
option_1: Both the statements are incorrect/दोनों कथन गलत है।
option_2: Both the statements are correct / दोनों कथन सही है।
option_3: Only statement 2 is correct / केवल कथन 2 सही है।
option_4: Only statement 1 is correct / केवल कथन 1 सही है।

question:
Which of the following is considered a capital expense? 
निम्नलिखित में से किसे पूंजीगत व्यय माना जाता है?
option_4: Construction of school buildings/स्कूल की इमारत का निर्माण

question:
Which of the following can degrade detritus into simpler inoganic substances ?
निम्नलिखित में से कौन अपरद को सरल अकार्बनिक पदार्थों में निम्नीकृत कर सकता है?

Mahendravarman I was the ruler of which of the following dynasties?
महेंद्रवर्मन प्रथम, निम्नलिखित में से किस राजवंश का शासक था?

Who among the following served as the first Chief Justice of India?
निम्नलिखित में से कौन, भारत के प्रथम मुख्य न्यायाधीश बने?

In which year was the 'Naye Bharat Ke Sapne campaign launched by Meta and the Ministry of Women?
मेटा और महिला एवं बाल विकास मंत्रालय द्वारा 'नए भारत के सपने' अभियान किस वर्ष शुरू किया गया था?

Which of the following is NOT correct about Directive Principles of State Policy?
राज्य नीति के निर्देशक सिद्धांतों के संदर्भ में निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन सही नहीं है?
option_1: They provide guidelines for the governance of the country. / ये देश के शासन के लिए दिशानिर्देश प्रदान करते हैं।
option_2: They ensure social and economic development./ये सामाजिक और आर्थिक विकास सुनिश्चित करते हैं।
option_3: They are justiciable in nature. / ये न्यायोचित प्रकृति के होते हैं।
option_4: They are morally binding on the government. / ये सरकार पर नैतिक रूप से बाध्यकारी होते हैं।

question:
The first southern campaign of Alauddin Khilji in 1307- 08 AD was led to which of the following regions?
1307-08 ई. में अलाउद्दीन खिलजी का पहला दक्षिणी अभियान निम्नलिखित में से किस क्षेत्र में हुआ था?

Which of the following is the largest crustal plate on Earth with an area of over 103,000,000 km²?
निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी पृथ्वी पर सबसे बड़ी भूपर्पटीय प्लेट है जिसका क्षेत्रफल 103,000,000 km² से अधिक है?
option_1: South American plate / दक्षिण अमेरिकी प्लेट

question:
What is the relationship between interest rate and demand for money?
ब्याज दर और मुद्रा की मांग के बीच क्या संबंध है?
option_4: No relationship exists/कोई संबंध नहीं है

question:
A light bulb working on a 18 V battery draws a current of 3 A. What will be the resistance of the bulb?
18 V की बैटरी से जलने वाला एक विद्युत बल्ब 3 A विद्युत धारा लेता है। बल्ब का प्रतिरोध क्या होगा?

Which of the following celebrations is dedicated to Sun God and his wife Usha to thank them for sustaining life on earth and for granting wishes?
निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा उत्सव सूर्य देव और उनकी पत्नी उषा को पृथ्वी पर जीवन बनाए रखने और इच्छाएँ प्रदान करने के लिए धन्यवाद देने के लिए समर्पित है?

Parts of a sentence are given below in jumbled order. Arrange the parts in the correct order to form a meaningful sentence.(A) After a few months, the two countries engaged in the Kargil war.(B) Furthermore, a number of violent wars were fought between India and Pakistan.(C) In February 1999, during the winter invasion, India and Pakistan signed the Lahore Declaration, which was predicted on peace.(D) The engagements were extremely challenging for the Indian army since they had to fight on rough rocky terrain.
Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.The new building was being constructed by the construction workers.
option_1: (a) The new building has being constructed by the construction workers?
option_2: (b) The new building is being constructed by the construction workers.
option_3: (c) The construction workers had been constructing the new building.
option_4: (d) The construction workers were constructing the new building.

question: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.Permeate
Select the correct direct/indirect speech of the given sentence.Professor told me that I could not rescue myself from that bait.
option_1: (a) Professor says to me, "You cannot rescue yourself from this bait."
option_2: (b) Professor said to me, "You have not rescued yourself from this bait."
option_3: (c) Professor said to us, "You cannot rescue yourself from this bait."
option_4: (d) Professor said to me, "You cannot rescue yourself from this bait."

question: The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains an error.The availability of funds will be/ensured if they all tried to / submit the proposals on time.
option_3: (c) The availability of funds will be
option_4: (d) ensured if they all tried to

question: Select the sentence that does not contain a spelling error.
option_1: (a) The body produces more saliva under fluorescent illumination which helps prewent cavaties.
option_2: (b) The body produces more saliva under fluorescent illumination which helps prevent cavities.
option_3: (c) The body produces more saliva under fluorescent illummination which helps prewent cavities.
option_4: (d) The body produces more saliva under fluorescent illummination which helps prevent cavaties

question: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined group of words.Making of a false document with a false signature.
Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.Peruse
Select the most appropriate idiom of the underlined words.My cousin sister Neetu had an aerial view of the trade fair from the top of the giant wheel.
option_1: (a) A bird in the gilded cage

question: Select the option that correctly expresses the given sentence in passive voice.He has not committed the crime
option_1: (a)   The crime has not been committed by him.
option_2: (b)   The crime have not been committed by him.
option_3: (c)    The crime was not committed by him.
option_4: (d)   The crime have not being committed by him.

question: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.Predicament

In the following passage, some words have been left out. Select the most appropriate option to fill in each blank.The (1) ______ of climate change is one of the most pressing issues facing the world today. Rising temperatures, extreme weather events and melting ice caps are just a few of the (2) ______ of a changing climate. To combat this, many countries have pledged to reduce their greenhouse gas emissions, but progress has been slow. In addition, some people are still sceptical of the (3) ______ of climate change or believe that it's a natural occurrence that humans can't do much about. However, scientists agree that urgent action is needed to prevent the worst impacts of climate change. This includes not only reducing emissions but also adapting to the changes that have already (4) ______ . This might involve building sea walls to protect against rising sea levels, planting drought-resistant crops or developing new technologies to remove carbon from the atmosphere. Ultimately, addressing climate change will require a (5) _____ effort from individuals, governments and businesses around the world.21. Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 1.
